name: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island
overview: Match 3 game wrapped in a story of a search for treasure among the Caribbean islands, battling sea monsters and pirates. Unique, atmospheric treasure hunting in the tropical islands Four different game modes based on Match Three mechanics 109 involving levels - Exciting duels against other sailing ships and sea monsters Beautiful graphics to recreate the exotic scenery of the Caribbean Excellent, atmospheric music that perfectly matches the game Seven kinds of bonuses to make the game easier 16 special challenges for the most accomplished players
